entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 3:52 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
